page.title: 08Midsummer in Glastonbury
page.content: The two main cultural attractions of the Glastonbury summer_ the{Pilton Pop {Festival}and the{Summer Solstice celebrations on the{Tor_}attract a particular brand of visitor.These celebrants are sometimes labelled "hippies" by the indigenous population on the strength of their unorthodox and colourful appearance. There are several shops which cater for their interests, selling vegetarian foods, and others which sell books, pictures and records, capitalising on their taste for the mystical and legendary stories which abound in Glastonbury. When we questioned people in the town about their attitude to the Pop Festival, the reaction was mostly positive. While condemning the much publicised use of drugs on the site, the advantages to the local youth, in terms of entertainment, were welcomed.
